caption: Within a cloud of nebula, something erupts and expands outward. A space probe floats through the cosmos, adjusting its solar panels toward a star. In a house, a man receives a phone call and drives away, while another person also answers a call and heads outside. They gather in an office in front of computers to commence observations. Several people intermittently appear, explaining various aspects. Several red luminous objects rotate and collide. Subsequently, various galaxies are shown, along with their images. A group of people continues their work in the office, observing images of galaxies. They compare differences between various images. In the cosmos, a luminous sphere is surrounded by a nebula, emitting two rays of light.
